data.text: @lifeofalawyer1 @DXBMediaOffice @EmiratesSupport Ah cool, welcome to Dubai for Friday then!
@stringham53 @nancy_hayek1991 @DXBMediaOffice It just shows what vaccines you have had. Yes with QR codes.
@FayazLambat @nancy_hayek1991 @DXBMediaOffice What kind of vaccine letter? Did it have a QR code?
@DXBMediaOffice Just checked in and no problem.
@DXBMediaOffice I can confirm to anyone reading this, double vaccination is all that is required. Didnâ€™t want booster or PCR if double vaccinated.
@FayazLambat @DXBMediaOffice Good to hear. My suitcases are packed! Have fun 😍

@nancy_hayek1991 @DXBMediaOffice Salaams/Morning

Just had to show covid vaccine letter at check in desk and plain sailing.

Landed and no checks at all.

Weathers just fine 😉

Safe travels
@lifeofalawyer1 @DXBMediaOffice @EmiratesSupport Oh absolutely! When are you traveling?
@MRahimRasool @DXBMediaOffice @EmiratesSupport Thanks much! Three shots so should be fine 💉💉💉
